attributes.action: Start online classes in UK because of the COVID-19
attributes.additional_details: Because lots of students on Coventry university I know are worried and scared to go to class because of the virus it will be great if online classes started
attributes.background: Start online classes , so that students could have classes online and stay safe from the COVID-19

rejection.details:
Decisions about how to run classes are a matter for individual educational institutions.

We have published two petitions calling for the Government to close educational institutions.

One petition calls for schools/colleges to be closed for an appropriate amount of time: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300403

One petition calls for universities to be closed for an appropriate amount of time: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300628

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
